comment: She's aware most people only take the class because they need the credit. She sets you up for success but you gotta meet her halfway.

She gives you a quiz every single class on a reading from the night before. These readings are very long but the quizzes are pretty straightforward short answer questions. Her lectures are boring. Shes a super nice person but gives too much work. Theres a family history project that is pretty extensive. Overall a good person but too much work
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES
